description: Person-level measures. As many of these measures are collected at 'baseline' it is currently called 'baseline.' However, this is a slight misnomer as, for example, current_study_status is dynamically updated.

fields.name: jdc_person_id
fields.description: The generated unique identifier specific to the JCOIN Data Commons for a given individual (client or staff).
fields.title: JCOIN data commons person identifier

fields.name: quarter_enrolled
fields.description: The financial quarter and year of enrollment
fields.title: Quarter Enrolled

fields.name: state_of_site_enrollment
fields.description: The U.S. State abbreviation of the site where client (participant) was initially enrolled
fields.title: State of Site For Enrollment

fields.name: current_study_status
fields.description: A summary of the current status where client (participant) is in study
fields.title: Current Study Status

fields.name: d1
fields.description: What is your birth date?
fields.title: Birth date

fields.name: d1a
fields.description: About how old are you? (top coded at 90)
fields.title: Age

fields.name: o1
fields.description: What sex was originally listed on your birth certificate?
fields.title: Sex at birth

custom.jcoin:notes:
For gender/orientation/identity, use items O1-O2 if possible, otherwise use D4a-D4c.   [Must use one or the other.] 
 False if not 'Male' and not 'Transfgender' else True

fields.name: o2
fields.description: What is your gender identity?

enum: Genderqueer/gender nonconforming/neither exclusively male nor female

fields.title: Gender Identity

custom.jcoin:notes: For gender/orientation/identity, use items O1-O2 if possible, otherwise use D4a-D4c.   [Must use one or the other.]

fields.name: d4b
fields.description: What is your gender identity?
fields.title: Gender Identity (condensed)

fields.name: d3_white
fields.description: [White] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
fields.title: Race: White

fields.name: d3_black
fields.description: [Black or African American] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
fields.title: Race: Black or African American

fields.name: d3_american_indian
fields.description: [American Indian or Alaska Native] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
fields.title: Race: American Indian or Alaska Native

fields.name: d3_hawaiian
fields.description: [Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
fields.title: Race: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

fields.name: d3_asian
fields.description: [Asian] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
fields.title: Race: Asian

fields.name: d3_other
fields.description: [Other] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
fields.title: Race: Other

fields.name: d3_specify_tribe
fields.description: [American indian principal tribe or community specified] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
fields.title: Race: American indian principal tribe or community specified

fields.name: d3_specify_other
fields.description: [Other specified] What is your race? SELECT ALL THAT APPLY
fields.title: Race: Other specified

fields.name: d2
fields.description: Are you of Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish origin?
fields.title: Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish Origin

fields.name: d4c
fields.description: Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself as…
fields.title: Sexual orientation

fields.name: d4c_specify_other
fields.description: Sexual orientation:  Do you think of yourself as…
fields.title: Sexual orientation:  Other specified

custom.jcoin:notes: Does this just apply to that past 90 days?  If not, then the participant should be able to check more than one response.

fields.name: d4d
fields.description: Have you ever been pregnant?

enum: Previously pregnant, did not have a child

fields.title: Ever pregnant

fields.name: d5
fields.description: What is your marital status?
fields.title: Marital status

fields.name: d5a
fields.description: Are you currently living as married with a romantic partner?

enum: Yes, I am living as married with partner
No, I am not living as married with partner

fields.title: Married with partner

fields.name: d6
fields.description: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?

enum: Some college credit but less than 1 year of college credit
1 or more years of college credit but no degree
Graduate degree (e.g., MSW, MA, MS, JD, MD, DSW, EdD, PhD)

fields.title: Education

fields.name: d6_grade
fields.description: What is the highest grade completed?
fields.title: Education:  Highest grade level (if less than GED or h.s. diploma)

fields.name: d6_specify_other
fields.description: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received?
fields.title: Education: Other specified

fields.name: u14f
fields.description: Interview conducted with participant during incarceration?
fields.title: Interviewed during incarceration

fields.name: u14g
fields.description: During the past xx/30 days, how many days have you been incarcerated?
fields.title: Days incarcerated (in past 30/xx days)

fields.name: u15
fields.description: Have you ever been prescribed and taken medication to treat opioid use disorder?  (Illicit use should be excluded.)
fields.title: Medication ever prescribed for opioid use disorder?

fields.name: u15a1
fields.description: Lifetime months (buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual [e.g., Suboxone film or tablet, generic films or tablets, or Subutex tablets])
fields.title: Buprenorphine-naloxone or buprenorphine daily sublingual: Lifetime months

fields.name: u15b1
fields.description: Lifetime months (buprenorphine injection [Sublocade])
fields.title: Buprenorphine injection (Sublocade):  Lifetime months

fields.name: u15c1
fields.description: Lifetime months (buprenorphine weekly injection [Brixadi])
fields.title: Buprenorphine  weekly injection (Brixadi):  Lifetime months

fields.name: u15d1
fields.description: Lifetime months (buprenorphine monthly injection [Brixadi])
fields.title: Buprenorphine  monthly injection (Brixadi):  Lifetime months

fields.name: u15e1
fields.description: Lifetime months (buprenorphine 6-month implant [Probuphine])
fields.title: Buprenorphine 6-month implant (Probuphine):  Lifetime months

fields.name: u15f1
fields.description: Lifetime months (Naltrexone daily (oral))
fields.title: Naltrexone daily (oral):  Lifetime months

fields.name: u15g1
fields.description: Lifetime months (Naltrexone monthly injection [Vivitrol])
fields.title: Naltrexone monthly injection (Vivitrol):  Lifetime months

fields.name: u15h1
fields.description: Lifetime months (methadone daily)
fields.title: Methadone daily:  Lifetime months
